text: Bae Joo-hyun (Korean: 배주현; born March 29, 1991), known professionally as Irene, is a South Korean singer in the group Red Velvet and its subunit Red Velvet - IRENE & SEULGI. She is the leader of the group and visual. ==Other websites== * Red Velvet's official website Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:K-pop singers Category:SM Entertainment artists Category:South Korean singers Category:Red Velvet (group)
title: Irene (singer)
